title.narrative: 007 SOCIAL NORMS

description.narrative: By 2015, child protection practices are adopted and implemented in targeted woredas in 8 regions, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2015, increased number of children who are registered, live in child-protecting families and communities and vulnerable children, including those in emergencies, benefit from gender sensitive and child friendly comprehensive interventions and services

mailing-address.narrative: UNICEF House (Kazanchis - Opposite UNECA/German House) P.O. Box 1169 Addis Ababa

sector.narrative: Advocacy and partnership-building for social behaviour change
Capacity and skills development for social behaviour change
Technical assistance - Cross-sectoral communication for development

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2015, child protection practices are adopted and implemented in targeted woredas in 8 regions

description.narrative: Establishment and strengthening of the secretariat of the National Alliance to End Child Marriage and FGM/C has contributed in maintaining the national momentum and bringing stakeholders around the table. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:30/06/2016

title.narrative: Number of woredas covered with communication interventions on birth registration

actual.value: 2016:6,433,952 community members in 42 woredas were reached through sensitization workshops in these woredas

title.narrative: Number of community care structures that promote family based care while discouraging institutionalization of children

actual.value: 2016:84 districts are compiled from four regions and this will further expand to new targets in the coming CPD period

title.narrative: Number of kebeles that have declared FGM/C abandonment in 6 regions

actual.value: 2016:229 declared and more than 359 kebeles in Afar, Amhara and Somali regions have continued the dialogue which is expected to lead towards the declaration of abandonment.

title.narrative: Number of kebeles that have community by laws that requires pre marital HIV testing& counseling

actual.value: 2016:Pre-martial HIV testing as a prerequisite for marriage is ongoing in almost all hotspot woredas. , Currently Pre-marital testing is one of the targeted intervention by the government .This is happening in almost all kebeles (universal coverage) particularly in hot spot and prevalent areas.
